nubsNob.comments: The Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub are all open from 9:00 – 4:00 today, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through today. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list. The lodge will be closed on Sunday, November 29th. Stay tuned for an announcement on an opening day to the ski season.
